author: Special Correspondent
text:
Puliyangudi police have arrested two persons for smuggling liquor, worth Rs. 1.50 lakh, from Puducherry.

Police said surprise raid was conducted in a farm at T.N. Puthukkudi in Puliyangudi on Tuesday following the information of smuggling of liquor from Puducherry and recovered 2,832 bottles, each containing 180 ml of liquor. The police team also seized 1 kg ganja from the farm.

During investigation, police found S. Thangaraj (54) and P. Ganesan (52), both from T.N. Puthukkudi had smuggled the liquor and ganja and arrested them.
title: Two persons arrested; 2,832 liquor bottles, ganja seized
